DataSource.Query: WITH data AS ( SELECT finance.transaction_master.book, finance.transaction_master.value_date, finance.transaction_master.book_date, inventory.items.item_name, inventory.stores.store_name, inventory.brands.brand_name, inventory.checkout_details.quantity, inventory.units.unit_code, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN inventory.checkout_details.quantity * inventory.checkout_details.price END AS debit, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN inventory.checkout_details.quantity * inventory.checkout_details.price END AS credit, finance.transaction_master.statement_reference FROM inventory.checkout_details INNER JOIN inventory.stores ON inventory.stores.store_id = inventory.checkout_details.store_id INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = inventory.checkout_details.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.brands ON inventory.brands.brand_id = inventory.items.brand_id INNER JOIN inventory.checkouts ON inventory.checkouts.checkout_id = inventory.checkout_details.checkout_id INNER JOIN finance.transaction_master ON finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = inventory.checkouts.transaction_master_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON inventory.units.unit_id = inventory.checkout_details.unit_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND finance.transaction_master.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To AND inventory.checkouts.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@ItemId, 0) = 0 OR inventory.items.item_id = @ItemId) AND (COALESCE(@StoreId, 0) = 0 OR inventory.checkout_details.store_id = @StoreId) AND (COALESCE(@BrandId, 0) = 0 OR inventory.items.brand_id = @BrandId) ) SELECT * FROM data ORDER BY value_date;
